Articles.Content: Mabye we should, if there even are going to be submissions, start a new thread whilst most ships are outdated for certain.

I would be ready to get back into this if ground forces are needed. I agree a new thread should be made for submissions.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...er-Medium-Tank

TANK!

I do realize that Macy has come back, and I will post some ships in the hope that they go to macy or hanland but I was hoping to get some ship submissions for MY new Kerbals At War series.

If you could please do that it would be wonderful.

PS: email is [email protected] or [email protected].

What sort of ships are you looking for? AKSTechnologies primarily focuses on low part count capital ships, as we all kknow how annoying it is to have to deal with lag (and how epic it is to have multiple capitals in one spot at once). Anyways, AKS mostly has ships around 50-100t, so if you want some corvettes/frigates, we are the place for you, and most of them (at least the new ones) are pretty darn resilient to enemy fire too.

I dont do emails, but if you want check the craft repository by clicking my sig picture, perhaps something there will be useful (and you are free to use any of my ships in your vids if they are what you want).

What sort of ships are you looking for? AKSTechnologies primarily focuses on low part count capital ships, as we all kknow how annoying it is to have to deal with lag (and how epic it is to have multiple capitals in one spot at once). Anyways, AKS mostly has ships around 50-100t, so if you want some corvettes/frigates, we are the place for you, and most of them (at least the new ones) are pretty darn resilient to enemy fire too.

I dont do emails, but if you want check the craft repository by clicking my sig picture, perhaps something there will be useful (and you are free to use any of my ships in your vids if they are what you want).

Currently I'm focusing on mainly military craft, though at this point I need as many ships as possible. Any donation is welcome and I will thank donors in sub-episodes.

Thanks

Currently I'm focusing on mainly military craft, though at this point I need as many ships as possible. Any donation is welcome and I will thank donors in sub-episodes.

Thanks

Ill send you a PM with some ships once i finish my new package (im close to releasing a fleet, 3 fighter types, 2 corvettes, 1 frigate, and possibly a carrier if i can get it to a point im not annoyed with it in some way). They are all under 300 parts, and the fighters are about as barebones as i could physically get them while retaining the intended looks. All have moderate performance in the armor, firepower, and range dept, although some excell in certain categories more then others, kinda generalist ships though.

I don't think submissions are a thing any more. I don't blame him, I went through the submissions and compiled them a few months ago and it took hours to just download them and paste the description into a text file, I can't think of the time needed to test them all.

If I may now direct your attention to Hawks of Hazard and Hatbat...

Hello people of the internet, I am Hawks Of Hazard, a wannabe Macy dean... I am currently working on my own Kerbals At War series and will release season 1 about summer time. In the meanwhile I need more ships, better software, I wanna improve, be the best I can be. If you have any ships you would like to submit I welcome you to do so, if you know a good recording software, etc. feel free to tell me. My youtube channel is Hawks Of Hazard, my email is [email protected] or [email protected]. So, to macy, welcome back, to everyone else, we have a war to prepare for. Build your ships, get your crew, and I'll see you on the battlefield.

What happened to the forum?

KRS Derian, a support carrier ready to support any company willing to buy the ship design.

We don't want it, our computers can't handle such rocketry. We'd like it if anyone else will be willing to use it, if any bidders are interested, please reply with information of your company.

http://i.imgur.com/4ZywQd2.png

I gotta update this for Macey and 1.0. and maybe actually get it to fly straight efficiently too.

In light of the recent resurgence of the SpiritWolf-Hanland Conflict, it can be hard to know who to trust. How is a space entrepreneur like you supposed to work when there's a war going on, and you never know who may be gunning for you? That's why GoldMeen Corp. is now promising a new escort service, starting soon. if anyone tries to cross your path, a contracted GoldMeenTM ship will be there to make them think twice. Now unveiling, the Secure Class Escort Attack Vessel! Coming SoonTM!

WARNING: THE IMAGES BELOW ARE FOR EMPLOYEE USE ONLY. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES ARE THEY TO BE LEAKED TO THE PUBLIC. THE INTERNAL DESIGN OF THE SECURE CLASS VESSELS IS A MAXIMUM SECURITY CONCERN.

Pilot's Console:

Flight Engineer's Console:

Brought to you by the GoldMeenTM Corporation

This is the only reason I'll ever play stock.

(If anyone wants to try to make this ship work, be my guest. I'm experiencing computer issues that make testing this a near impossibility.)

Are you guys looking for spacecraft designs? Becaus I'm working on this fleet... it's mostly science vessels, transports and cargo craft but it would be easy enough to add weapons and armor

JR

Are you guys looking for spacecraft designs? Becaus I'm working on this fleet... it's mostly science vessels, transports and cargo craft but it would be easy enough to add weapons and armor

http://i.imgur.com/VmDPlbF.png

JR

Those look pretty nice, and i see at least 2 of those have starwars influence (look like that ship in beginning of EP4 but not as many engines in teh rear).

I dont see their armor holding up to a competitive battle, but i think the large amount of MK2/MK3 parts which are medium armor for all intents and purposes will give these similar survivability to my cylon basestar and pretty much all my SSTOs/fighters/bombers which are more or less nothing but MK2 stuff.

Ohh, and if you guys are interested,m my basestar is ~300 parts unarmed and with no fighters aboads, this isnt THAT bad considering that the thing is almost unable to fit inside the VAB. Working on a similar scaled less replica carrier though which will be ~250 parts max. Its not gonna look like a cylon ship, but its still inspired by it, and unlike the thing i posted earlier, this ones is actyually ABLE TO LAUNCH 100% stock with no Hedit, mods, cheats, ect. Ofc flying it is still a pain in the arse, but it will get into orbit and you dont even need to go slow, just has a puller style rocket which allows even masses of wings to be launched at 200+ m/s.

Edited August 13, 2015 by panzer1b
